titles.title: Lord, You've Really Been Good To Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, You've really been good to me!
Lord, You've really been good to me!
You've taken my burdens and You set me free!
You've really been good to me!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, I want to thank You for all You've done;
You rescued and You ransomed me.
My life was all in pieces but You made it one.
You've really been good to me.
